text.autoconfig.bridgingmod.title: Bridging Mod
text.autoconfig.bridgingmod.option.delay: How many ticks before you can place again? 4 is vanilla. 3 makes bridging easier.
text.autoconfig.bridgingmod.option.nonBr: Show Non-Bridge-Assist when Bridging is enabled
Crouching rules & Bridging being enabled or disabled affects whether this outline is visible.

text.autoconfig.bridgingmod.option.showD: Show Bridge-Assist block trail in F3
